name: Tempeh
properties: Steam before using to improve digestibility
benefits: Tempeh is a fermented whole soybean product that provides complete protein with intact fiber. The fermentation process adds beneficial probiotics for gut health. Studies show soy phytoestrogens have no significant effect on fibroid frequency or growth, making it safe for regular consumption.
amount: Can be part of regular meals, typically 4-8 ounces per serving

quotes: If you make the curried tempeh and chickpeas in advance of when you want to serve this dish, the flavours will have time to merge and get even bolder.

About one in four women will suffer from fibroids, most commonly with excessively heavy periods and pain or pressure. Is there a link to soya? No. The amount of soya phytoestrogen in three to five cups of soya milk a day had no significant effect on the frequency or growth of fibroids.
